model2:

each model is built on the previous one

1. only feature probability, Pos window size = 1
P, R, F1, Acc.
65.19970414201184 39.29128593715177 49.0335141148658 90.51206378792585

2. observation probability * feature probability
P, R, F1, Acc.
53.313973351554495 69.55649654557611 60.3616671501789 89.38852645749198

3. increase Pos window size to 2
P, R, F1, Acc.
53.49794238683128 69.53420993982617 60.470975869754824 89.44030237133686

4. include previous word
P, R, F1, Acc.
54.364525139664806 69.4004903053265 60.969162995594715 89.6784715750233

5. include next word
P, R, F1, Acc.
54.46741415557113 69.28905727657678 60.99068170671897 89.70435953194574

6. increase Pos window size to 3
P, R, F1, Acc.
54.4153577661431 69.48963672832627 61.03552902026035 89.69400434917677
